Package game

Class TradeManager

java.lang.Object
game.TradeManager
public class TradeManager
extends java.lang.Object
A utils class for trading

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TradeManager()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.util.List<Action> getPurchasingAction​(Actor whoHasThis, Item i, int purchasingPrice)
    Function that is called by trader who can buy from trader Approach description: 1) check if the person who holds this weapon is trader or not 2) if it is trader, get all the player locations around this trader if possible 3) should only produce a list of len 1 if there is player nearby, 4) add the purchase action Note: can only be called by trader
    static java.util.List<Action> getPurchasingAction​(Actor whoHasThis, WeaponItem w, int purchasingPrice)
    Function that is called by trader who can buy from trader Approach description: 1) check if the person who holds this weapon is trader or not 2) if it is trader, get all the player locations around this trader if possible 3) should only produce a list of len 1 if there is player nearby, 4) add the purchase action Note: can only be called by trader
    static java.util.List<Action> getSellingAction​(Actor whoHasThis, Item i, int sellingPrice)
    Function that is called by player who can sell to trader Approach description: 1) check if the person who holds this weapon is player or not 2) if it is player, get all the trader locations around this player if possible 3) for each trader, add a sell action to that trader Note: only called by player
    static java.util.List<Action> getSellingAction​(Actor whoHasThis, WeaponItem w, int sellingPrice)
    Function that is called by player who can sell to trader Approach description: 1) check if the person who holds this weapon is player or not 2) if it is player, get all the trader locations around this player if possible 3) for each trader, add a sell action to that trader Note: only called by player
    static java.util.List<Action> getTradeAction​(Actor whoHasThis, Item i, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> nameOfTradableTraders, java.util.ArrayList<WeaponItem> tradableWeapons)
    Function that is called by trader who can buy from trader Approach description: 1) check if the person who holds this weapon is player or not 2) if it is player, get all the trader locations around this player if possible 3) for each trader, check if the item is tradable with this trader or not using the list of tradable trader names

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public TradeManager()

  • Method Details

    • getSellingAction

      public static java.util.List<Action> getSellingAction​(Actor whoHasThis, WeaponItem w, int sellingPrice)
      Function that is called by player who can sell to trader Approach description: 1) check if the person who holds this weapon is player or not 2) if it is player, get all the trader locations around this player if possible 3) for each trader, add a sell action to that trader Note: only called by player
      Parameters:
      whoHasThis - player
      w - a new instance of the weapon item
      sellingPrice - the selling price of the weapon
      Returns:
      a list of selling actions to all possible traders list is of length 0 if no possible actions are possible

    • getSellingAction

      public static java.util.List<Action> getSellingAction​(Actor whoHasThis, Item i, int sellingPrice)
      Function that is called by player who can sell to trader Approach description: 1) check if the person who holds this weapon is player or not 2) if it is player, get all the trader locations around this player if possible 3) for each trader, add a sell action to that trader Note: only called by player
      Parameters:
      whoHasThis - player
      i - a new instance of the item
      sellingPrice - the selling price of the item
      Returns:
      a list of selling actions to all possible traders list is of length 0 if no possible actions are possible

    • getPurchasingAction

      public static java.util.List<Action> getPurchasingAction​(Actor whoHasThis, WeaponItem w, int purchasingPrice)
      Function that is called by trader who can buy from trader Approach description: 1) check if the person who holds this weapon is trader or not 2) if it is trader, get all the player locations around this trader if possible 3) should only produce a list of len 1 if there is player nearby, 4) add the purchase action Note: can only be called by trader
      Parameters:
      whoHasThis - trader
      w - the weapon that can be bought from trader
      purchasingPrice - the purchase price of the weapon
      Returns:
      a list of actions list is of length 0 if no possible actions are possible

    • getPurchasingAction

      public static java.util.List<Action> getPurchasingAction​(Actor whoHasThis, Item i, int purchasingPrice)
      Function that is called by trader who can buy from trader Approach description: 1) check if the person who holds this weapon is trader or not 2) if it is trader, get all the player locations around this trader if possible 3) should only produce a list of len 1 if there is player nearby, 4) add the purchase action Note: can only be called by trader
      Parameters:
      whoHasThis - trader
      i - the item that can be bought from trader
      purchasingPrice - the purchase price of the item list is of length 0 if no possible actions are possible
      Returns:
      a list of actions list is of length 0 if no possible actions are possible

    • getTradeAction

      public static java.util.List<Action> getTradeAction​(Actor whoHasThis, Item i, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> nameOfTradableTraders, java.util.ArrayList<WeaponItem> tradableWeapons)
      Function that is called by trader who can buy from trader Approach description: 1) check if the person who holds this weapon is player or not 2) if it is player, get all the trader locations around this player if possible 3) for each trader, check if the item is tradable with this trader or not using the list of tradable trader names
      Parameters:
      whoHasThis - the player
      i - the item to be swapped with
      nameOfTradableTraders - the list of all traders this item can be used to swap for another item/weapon with
      tradableWeapons - the list of all weapons this can be traded for
      Returns:
      a list of actions list is of length 0 if no possible actions are possible
